name: AFGCentralStorageSubsystem
comment: Handles the central storage system in the game.

methods.name: Get
methods.comment: Get the central storage, this should always return something unless you call it really early.

methods.name: Get
methods.comment: Get the central storage from a world context, this should always return something unless you call it really early.

methods.name: IsCentralStorageBuilt
methods.comment: @return True if we've at least 1 central storage built; false if 0.

methods.name: GetCentralStorageContainers
methods.comment: @return All central storages built; empty if none built.

methods.name: GetNumItemsFromCentralStorage
methods.comment: @return Number of items available across all the central storages.

methods.name: RemoveItemsFromCentralStorage
methods.comment:
@param itemClass - Type of items to remove.
@param num - Number of items to remove. Must be >= 0. If count is more than the items available, a partial remove is done and a warning is raised.

methods.name: AddCentralStorage
methods.comment: Called by the central storage when built/destroyed.

properties.name: CentralStorageAddedOrRemoved
properties.comment: Called when a central storage has been removed
